alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 10:58PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN COOK, EAST CENTRAL ST. LOUIS AND CENTRAL LAKE COUNTIES THROUGH 1130 PM CDT... At 1058 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles south of Babbitt, to 6 miles northwest of Finland, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hoyt Lakes, Silver Bay, Aurora, Babbitt, Biwabik, Clear Lake, Tofte, Beaver Bay, Fairbanks, Little Marais, Whyte, Sugar Loaf Cove, Taconite Harbor, Thomas Lake Near Brimson, Finland, Isabella, Illgen City, Dumbbell Lake, Split Rock Lighthouse, and Seven Beaver Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore
